price: 46. Mpe mobengi (bato) na nzela ya Allah na ndingisa naye moko, mpe ozala lokola mwinda ya bongengi.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
